game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Find and return the stolen heirloom to its rightful owner
game.description: Lady Whimsy's favorite necklace has been pilfered, and she needs someone brave to retrieve it. The thief is rumored to be hiding in the nearby forest.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a boost in reputation

tasks.objective: Gather information about the thief's identity
tasks.description: Speak to the locals and gather any clues that might lead you to the thief.

tasks.objective: Track down the thief in the nearby forest
tasks.description: Follow the trail of breadcrumbs left by the thief and confront them in their lair.

tasks.objective: Return the stolen heirloom to Lady Whimsy
tasks.description: Present the necklace to Lady Whimsy and receive your reward.
